step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped loosely in your lap, and try to relax your shoulders down.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you bring your hands up.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Good hold! Try to maintain that elbow width and keep your chest open.
Smooth return to the starting position. Ensure your hands clasp gently.
Second rep starting well. Continue to keep your elbows close as you raise your hands towards your forehead.
Good movement here. Focus on maintaining that elbow proximity to your head.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide. Keep your head steady and avoid any forward pull.
Great hold! You're maintaining good form with your elbows wide and chest open.
Excellent finish to the second rep. You're returning smoothly to the start.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close to your head when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Maintain an upright posture and avoid pulling forward for best results.
